query:
-- Atualizar roles para empresaId correto (assumindo que é a primeira empresa)
UPDATE roles SET empresaId = (SELECT id FROM empresas WHERE email = 'teste@empresa.com' LIMIT 1) WHERE empresaId = 1;

-- Atualizar colaboradores para empresaId correto
UPDATE colaboradores SET empresaId = (SELECT id FROM empresas WHERE email = 'teste@empresa.com' LIMIT 1) WHERE empresaId = 1;

-- Verificar dados
SELECT 'Roles' as tipo, COUNT(*) as total FROM roles
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Colaboradores' as tipo, COUNT(*) as total FROM colaboradores
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Permissões' as tipo, COUNT(*) as total FROM permissoes
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Audit Logs' as tipo, COUNT(*) as total FROM audit_logs;
